Text:
thanks for this, a friend will be very happy when i give him a copy

by the way, are you going to upload the Mick Jagger compilation again? it looked awesome!

Most of my posts from July disappeared from TPB.
I'm still seeding them as they are listed in my UTorrent app.
I also dont use apostrophes & hyphens here now.
Also, I cant edit my remaining posts....WTF
TPB needs to get their developers on the ball & fix these problems.
